meanings.definition: A type of clothing worn by young people.
meanings.sent1: She loved shopping for posteens at the mall.
meanings.sent2: Many students wore posteens to school.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured colorful posteens on the runway.
meanings.sent4: Her closet was filled with posteens of all styles and colors.
meanings.sent5: The store had a sale on trendy posteens for teenagers.

meanings.definition: A style of pants popular among teenagers.
meanings.sent1: He bought a new pair of posteens for the party.
meanings.sent2: Posteens with ripped knees were all the rage.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created unique posteens for the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: She strutted down the street in her favorite posteens.
meanings.sent5: The store displayed a variety of posteens in the window.

meanings.definition: A term used to describe a specific fashion trend among adolescents.
meanings.sent1: The magazine featured an article on the latest posteens.
meanings.sent2: Posteens from the 90s are making a comeback.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her dad's old posteens were back in style.
meanings.sent4: The fashion blogger predicted the next big posteens trend.
meanings.sent5: The runway show showcased avant-garde posteens for teens.
